title: [Patreon Preview] Michael Yo
itunes:title: [Patreon Preview] Michael Yo
description:
This week, we have special guest Michael Yo! Listen to them talk about Michael wanting Jim to be his first ever smoking buddy, Jim almost being tricked into hosting the Golden Globes, and the original Aunt Viv from the Fresh Prince wanting to slap Michael.

Check out Michael's newest standup special "I Never Thought" on Youtube!

Subscribe to our Patreon at patreon.com/IDKAT for ad free episodes, bonus episodes, and more exclusive perks! Tiers start at just $2!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
